1.5.2.name: wordpress/wp-automedia
1.5.2.description:
This plugin may have some life left in it for some folks, but as of August 2013, I have decided to discontinue work on this plugin. There are far better solutions to automatic uploads in WordPress at this time. I plan to release a version of the Android app which doesn't require a plugin to work at some time in the future.

Thank you all for downloading and using, and by all means if you can still use this, enjoy!

That being said - This is a very basic plugin, intended to add your uploads directly to your Media Library for easy publishing. No more moving files around from phones and cameras in order to publish them. Simply batch upload or use the WordPress AutoMedia plugin for Android powered phones (iPhone App and Microsoft Phone App coming soon!)

Download the Android App at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vedstudio.wpam

See also
